text: Ismael a Netanian otarim, egha a Elisaman igiavotarim, egha a Judan atrivibar ikɨzir mam. Ezɨ azenir kamɨn namba 7ɨn iakɨnim, a 10plan gumaziba inigha me Mispan izegha Gedalia mɨsoghezɨ an areme. Egha me uaghan Judan gumaziba ko Babilonian mɨdorozir gumazir Gedalia ko Mispan itiba bar me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire.
